item.text: Entrepreneurs are business owners, obsessed about being their own boss. They believe in themselves, have confidence, and the ability to acquire funds to fuel their money-making ventures.
Job Change Requirements A Knowledge (Business, Civics or Technology) Skill Modifier of +15 or greater and 200 WP which must be paid out for various start up costs.
Skills (2) Knowledge (Business, Civics or Technology), or Speechcraft.
